attributes.name: Integrity
attributes.description: Integrity - One of the Core Attributes and Key of Prohet's (PBUH) ,It was the key to his Purpose and Success

attributes.name: No EGO
attributes.description: Annihilated personal ego, embodying humility and selflessness in all actions.

attributes.name: 100% Accuracy in Knowledge , skill and attributes
attributes.description: Performed every task with flawless precision , Knowledge was authentic and unerring, attrbutes were perfectly manifested.Giving his Full force and acquired every Goal with 100% perfection in regard of knowledge , skill and attributes.

attributes.name: HUMILITY
attributes.description: Humility only for GOD alone , Never for any other being or self

attributes.name: Qulu Qawlan Sadida
attributes.description: Fear God in speech and action , always speak the truth and act righteously - Quran  (33:70)

attributes.name: CLARITY
attributes.description: Clarity over Chaos, Seek  Clarity in every situation , Clear Vision and Mission

attributes.name: FOCUS
attributes.description: Unwavering Focus on Goals , No distractions , impeccable concentration - aligned with the Purpose all the time , Ignoring crafts of the Opposition

attributes.name: Intrepidity - Fearlessness
attributes.description: Courage, Dauntless , Indomitable Spirit , Being Fearless in verge of Death , Man of Unshakebale Purpose, Fearless Face and Heart

attributes.name: Constancy- Steadfastness-Endurance
attributes.description: He (saw) was told to be Stoical  and have  Patience  and not to Deter  from the path of Truth

attributes.name: Courage-Bravery
attributes.description: Courageous and showed intrepid ultimate bravey where  valiant valors couldnt.. He was firm and didnt retreat , fearless

attributes.name: Haqq- Rigteousness
attributes.description: Truth , Righteousness over Peace ,Justice, Morality over Desire

attributes.name: Mercy-Compassion
attributes.description: Showed Mercy to all even to the enemies

attributes.name: Forgiving-Kind
attributes.description: Always Forgiving and Kindness, 'Indeed Those who are strong are always Kind'

attributes.name: TRUST IN ALLAH
attributes.description: Absolute-Unshakeable-Solid- Trust in ALLAH

attributes.name: Generosity- Giving Mindset
attributes.description: He (PBUH) was always Generous ,  Giving Mindset

attributes.name: Overwhelmed Everything Beneath
attributes.description: He  is effective and productive at all levels, He overwhelms all beneath him

attributes.name: Standard of 'Patience- Perseverance-Forbearance'
attributes.description: Patience in times of Hardship, Forbearance overcoming quick-temperedness and extreme ignorance only increasing him in Forbearance, Calm-Persistence in times of Catastrophe and Adversity

attributes.name: Liberality
attributes.description: Forgo what one is  owed

attributes.name: As-Sadiq (The Truthful)
attributes.description: Perfect honesty in speech and action. The Prophet was universally known for his unwavering commitment to truth, never breaking a promise or speaking falsehood

attributes.name: Al-Ameen (The Trustworthy)
attributes.description: The tribes of Mecca entrusted him with their most valuable possessions. Even his enemies acknowledged his integrity.

attributes.name: Strategic Intelligence
attributes.description: Demonstrated exceptional foresight in diplomatic treaties (Hudaybiyyah) and military defense (The Trench).

attributes.name: Moral Courage
attributes.description: Stood firm against persecution with patience and dignity, never compromising principles for personal safety.

attributes.name: Merciful Disposition
attributes.description: His compassion extended to enemies, animals, and the environment.

attributes.name: Eloquent Communication
attributes.description: Possessed Jawami al-Kalim (concise yet comprehensive speech), able to convey profound wisdom in few words.

skills: Observed Silence in times of  Forbearance , Precaution , Estimation , Deliberation
Weigthty Mind, Faultless Insights,Intellectual Genius ,Keen observer, `Man with Higher Realites
Serene Looks and Calm Demeanor under pressure
